This is episode 02 of the One Bedroom House series, showing you how to draw a small house "From Start To Finish". My hope is that you will learn the fundamentals so that you can apply them to your own projects.

In this video, I will be showing you steps to take when starting a new project in AutoCAD Architecture. The principles demonstrated in this video can be used on any project that you're going to begin.

Thank you all for watching and sharing. 
Give it a like, and subscribe!
